scripts.build-deps: browserify -t babelify  -r bluebird -r lodash -r react/addons | uglifyjs -c >  build/el-externdeps.bundle.min.js
scripts.build-inter: browserify -t babelify -x bluebird -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./src/interactives.js:interactives -r -o build/el-interactives.bundle.js -d
scripts.watch-inter: watchify   -t  babelify -x bluebird -x jquery -x lodash -x react/addons -r ./src/interactives.js:interactives -r -o build/el-interactives.bundle.js -d -v
